<a id="VisualShaderNodeIntParameter"></a>

# VisualShaderNodeIntParameter

**Inherits:** [VisualShaderNodeParameter](VisualShaderNodeParameter.md) **\<** [VisualShaderNode](VisualShaderNode.md) **\<** [Resource](Resource.md) **\<** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

A visual shader node for shader parameter (uniform) of type [int](int.md).

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

A [VisualShaderNodeParameter](VisualShaderNodeParameter.md) of type [int](int.md). Offers additional customization for range of accepted values.

<!-- classref-reftable-group -->

## Enumerations

<a id="enum_VisualShaderNodeIntParameter_Hint"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration -->

enum **Hint**: [ðŸ”—](#enum_VisualShaderNodeIntParameter_Hint)

<a id="VisualShaderNodeIntParameter_constant_HINT_NONE"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[Hint](VisualShaderNodeIntParameter.md#enum_VisualShaderNodeIntParameter_Hint) **HINT_NONE** = `0`

The parameter will not constrain its value.<a id="VisualShaderNodeIntParameter_constant_HINT_RANGE"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[Hint](VisualShaderNodeIntParameter.md#enum_VisualShaderNodeIntParameter_Hint) **HINT_RANGE** = `1`

The parameter's value must be within the specified [min](VisualShaderNodeIntParameter.md#VisualShaderNodeIntParameter_property_min)/[max](VisualShaderNodeIntParameter.md#VisualShaderNodeIntParameter_property_max) range.<a id="VisualShaderNodeIntParameter_constant_HINT_RANGE_STEP"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[Hint](VisualShaderNodeIntParameter.md#enum_VisualShaderNodeIntParameter_Hint) **HINT_RANGE_STEP** = `2`

The parameter's value must be within the specified range, with the given [step](VisualShaderNodeIntParameter.md#VisualShaderNodeIntParameter_property_step) between values.<a id="VisualShaderNodeIntParameter_constant_HINT_ENUM"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[Hint](VisualShaderNodeIntParameter.md#enum_VisualShaderNodeIntParameter_Hint) **HINT_ENUM** = `3`

The parameter uses an enum to associate preset values to names in the editor.<a id="VisualShaderNodeIntParameter_constant_HINT_MAX"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[Hint](VisualShaderNodeIntParameter.md#enum_VisualShaderNodeIntParameter_Hint) **HINT_MAX** = `4`

Represents the size of the [Hint](VisualShaderNodeIntParameter.md#enum_VisualShaderNodeIntParameter_Hint) enum.<hr class="classref-section-separator"/>

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Property Descriptions

<a id="VisualShaderNodeIntParameter_property_default_value"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[int](int.md) **default_value** = `0` [ðŸ”—](#VisualShaderNodeIntParameter_property_default_value)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_default_value**\ (\ value\: [int](int.md)\ )
- [int](int.md) **get_default_value**\ (\ )

Default value of this parameter, which will be used if not set externally. [default_value_enabled](VisualShaderNodeIntParameter.md#VisualShaderNodeIntParameter_property_default_value_enabled) must be enabled; defaults to ``0`` otherwise.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="VisualShaderNodeIntParameter_property_default_value_enabled"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](bool.md) **default_value_enabled** = `false` [ðŸ”—](#VisualShaderNodeIntParameter_property_default_value_enabled)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_default_value_enabled**\ (\ value\: [bool](bool.md)\ )
- [bool](bool.md) **is_default_value_enabled**\ (\ )

If ``true``, the node will have a custom default value.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="VisualShaderNodeIntParameter_property_enum_names"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[PackedStringArray](PackedStringArray.md) **enum_names** = `PackedStringArray()` [ðŸ”—](#VisualShaderNodeIntParameter_property_enum_names)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_enum_names**\ (\ value\: [PackedStringArray](PackedStringArray.md)\ )
- [PackedStringArray](PackedStringArray.md) **get_enum_names**\ (\ )

The names used for the enum select in the editor. [hint](VisualShaderNodeIntParameter.md#VisualShaderNodeIntParameter_property_hint) must be [HINT_ENUM](VisualShaderNodeIntParameter.md#VisualShaderNodeIntParameter_constant_HINT_ENUM) for this to take effect.

**Note:** The returned array is *copied* and any changes to it will not update the original property value. See [PackedStringArray](PackedStringArray.md) for more details.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="VisualShaderNodeIntParameter_property_hint"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[Hint](VisualShaderNodeIntParameter.md#enum_VisualShaderNodeIntParameter_Hint) **hint** = `0` [ðŸ”—](#VisualShaderNodeIntParameter_property_hint)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_hint**\ (\ value\: [Hint](VisualShaderNodeIntParameter.md#enum_VisualShaderNodeIntParameter_Hint)\ )
- [Hint](VisualShaderNodeIntParameter.md#enum_VisualShaderNodeIntParameter_Hint) **get_hint**\ (\ )

Range hint of this node. Use it to customize valid parameter range.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="VisualShaderNodeIntParameter_property_max"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[int](int.md) **max** = `100` [ðŸ”—](#VisualShaderNodeIntParameter_property_max)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_max**\ (\ value\: [int](int.md)\ )
- [int](int.md) **get_max**\ (\ )

The maximum value this parameter can take. [hint](VisualShaderNodeIntParameter.md#VisualShaderNodeIntParameter_property_hint) must be either [HINT_RANGE](VisualShaderNodeIntParameter.md#VisualShaderNodeIntParameter_constant_HINT_RANGE) or [HINT_RANGE_STEP](VisualShaderNodeIntParameter.md#VisualShaderNodeIntParameter_constant_HINT_RANGE_STEP) for this to take effect.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="VisualShaderNodeIntParameter_property_min"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[int](int.md) **min** = `0` [ðŸ”—](#VisualShaderNodeIntParameter_property_min)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_min**\ (\ value\: [int](int.md)\ )
- [int](int.md) **get_min**\ (\ )

The minimum value this parameter can take. [hint](VisualShaderNodeIntParameter.md#VisualShaderNodeIntParameter_property_hint) must be either [HINT_RANGE](VisualShaderNodeIntParameter.md#VisualShaderNodeIntParameter_constant_HINT_RANGE) or [HINT_RANGE_STEP](VisualShaderNodeIntParameter.md#VisualShaderNodeIntParameter_constant_HINT_RANGE_STEP) for this to take effect.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="VisualShaderNodeIntParameter_property_step"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[int](int.md) **step** = `1` [ðŸ”—](#VisualShaderNodeIntParameter_property_step)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_step**\ (\ value\: [int](int.md)\ )
- [int](int.md) **get_step**\ (\ )

The step between parameter's values. Forces the parameter to be a multiple of the given value. [hint](VisualShaderNodeIntParameter.md#VisualShaderNodeIntParameter_property_hint) must be [HINT_RANGE_STEP](VisualShaderNodeIntParameter.md#VisualShaderNodeIntParameter_constant_HINT_RANGE_STEP) for this to take effect.
